ygData.subject: Niv's graphic???
ygData.msgSnippet: Something I noticed last night... can someone confirm this? During some downtime last night I was doing this twist hymn, niv s, mana song till others wear off
ygData.messageBody:
Something I noticed last night... can someone confirm this?

During some downtime last night I was doing this twist hymn, niv's, mana song till others wear off and I noticed that when I did Niv's I flung my arms out as if casting a spell instead of strumming my lute?

I am using a gupsy lute... the 5%, +5 MR lute. I later confirmed that everytime I played niv's with that lute... I flung my arms out. I will test it with other strings, but another bard got the correct graphic when using his 7-string...

Has this been around for awhile or what?

Kerouac Dharmabum
lvl 50
Rodcent Nife



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
